Description: Papyrus with literary texts on recto and verso; fifteen fragments belonging to the bottom edge of a roll; recto text is written in pages of horizontal lines, with vertical lines at the end; the verso text is written in pages of horizontal lines with verse points.
Curator's comments: The fragments showing the margin (bottom on recto, top on verso) are mostly arranged as unrolled; other smaller fragments misplaced. The frames are misnumbered.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381269) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381269)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus Black ink Red ink Supported locally glassine paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: self adhesive tape Object Priority: A Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: A Curatorial condition comment: fragmentary (slightly stained)
